incidents.name: Malformed Multi-Segment Incoming SMS Messages Not Logged

incident_updates.body:
Due to an internal error that occurred from 12:28 PST 8/18 through 12:58 PST 8/23, malformed incoming multi-segment SMS messages were not logged. These messages are normally logged with Twilio error 30009:

- https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/30009

The issue has now been resolved, and malformed incoming messages are now being logged.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue that affected logging of incoming messages. Note this is specific to incomplete multi-segment messages, which are typically logged with Twilio error 30009. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: WhatsApp Registration and Template Status Issues

incident_updates.body: All WhatsApp template statuses are up-to-date. Sending WhatsApp messages using a template is operating normally at this time.

Some WhatsApp template statuses may be outdated. As a result, sending WhatsApp messages using a template with an outdated status may fail until the status is updated. Any new template status updates are correctly being captured. Our engineering team has identified the cause for outdated statuses and is working on a fix to ensure all template statuses are up-to-date. Previously incorrect WhatsApp template categories have been synced and are now accurate. Any onboarding issues for new WhatsApp senders have been mitigated. There is also no impact to receiving WhatsApp messages. We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Delays in Super SIM Connection Events has been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

The issue causing delays in Super SIM Connection Events has been identified. The team deployed new service instances to mitigate the impact and devices reconnecting after 18:58 UTC will not encounter delays. Existing connections are being transferred to the newly deployed instances. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Customers Remaining Suspended After Making Payments

incident_updates.body: The issue with Pay-As-You-Go customers seeing their accounts remaining in a suspended status after making a successful payment has been resolved.
The issue with Pay-As-You-Go customers seeing their accounts remaining in a suspended status after making a successful payment has been fixed. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes.

We have detected an issue where Pay-As-You-Go customers are seeing their accounts remain in a suspended status after making a successful payment. Our Engineers are actively investigating this issue. In the meantime, we ask that customers experiencing this issue sign out and sign back in to refresh their credentials, and if their account is still suspended and its been more than 20 minutes since the payment was made, submit a support ticket. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Products

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue with Twilio Rest API have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery with the Twilio Rest API issue impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. We will be monitoring all services to ensure full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. For Studio, some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. For Studio, some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Flex, CDX, and Messaging. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Studio is still operational but some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Voice, Flex, CDX, and Messaging.  Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue impacting SMS, MMS, Voice, Verify, Flex, and Proxy.  Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with SMS, MMS, Flex Messaging, and Verify. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We are continuing to observe recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Beeline Network In Kazakhstan. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Beeline Network In Kazakhstan. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Beeline Network In Kazakhstan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Beeline Network In Kazakhstan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
